description.value: Immune to Seduction, Charm Tests get -10 against you. Gain 1 Insanity Point. Talent is renamed to Cold Hearted in later editions.

system.benefit: Immune to Seduction, Charm Tests get -10 against you. Gain 1 Insanity Point. Talent is renamed to Cold Hearted in later editions.

specialAbilities.name: Immune to Seduction
specialAbilities.description: Immune to Seduction. Charm Tests against you have -10. Gain 1 Insanity Point when taking this talent.
